title: BIE Professional Examination Funding 2025-2026
short_description: Financial assistance to cover professional examination costs.
full_description: Native Forward Scholars Fund, in partnership with the BIE, provides financial assistance to Fellows to cover the cost of professional examinations, including Bar Examination funding. Exam assistance is limited to a single examination which must be taken within one calendar year after graduation date. This award covers fees incurred to register for the exam, costs of preparatory courses and other exam-related expenses.
eligibility: Must be currently funded by BIE Scholarship for Service or similar programs; must have graduated within one year of applying; limited to one professional examination.
